word: IT IS MY CONVICTION, BROTHER FROOM, THAT YOU WILL NEVER GET LIGHT REGARDING THE BACKGROUND OF THE GIFT OF THE SPIRIT OF PROPHECY BY STUDYING THE CHARACTERISTICS AND QUALIFICATIONS OF THE FAITHFUL COPYIST AND THE COPY EDITORS, WHOM SISTER WHITE CALLED TO HER ASSISTANCE IN PREPARING FOR PUBLICATION ARTICLES FOR OUR PERIODICAL AND CHAPTERS FOR HER BOOKS.
